description: This Java source file contains the security configuration for a Spring Boot project, specifically setting up JWT-based authentication, CORS policies, and API documentation via OpenAPI/Swagger. It defines security filters, authorization rules, and API info documentation.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for setting up security, CORS, and API documentation in a Spring Boot application.

methods.name: filterChain
methods.description: Defines the security filter chain with CORS, CSRF disabling, endpoint authorization, and JWT filter integration.

methods.name: passwordEncoder
methods.description: Provides a PasswordEncoder bean; currently NoOpPasswordEncoder for demonstration purposes.

methods.name: openAPI
methods.description: Configures the OpenAPI documentation including API info and security scheme.

methods.name: apiGroup
methods.description: Defines a grouped OpenAPI configuration matching all API paths.
